response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its utility and potential impact on your endeavors. Considering its true worth, I am extending a special offer to you. If you decide to take advantage of this offer, you can purchase the product for $14,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it a truly attractive proposition. I believe this investment could greatly benefit you and align with your goals. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
